connector.description: Send requests to with an ElasticSearch via REST API.

camel.sink.endpoint.connectionTimeout.name: camel.sink.endpoint.connectionTimeout
camel.sink.endpoint.connectionTimeout.description: The time in ms to wait before connection will timeout.

camel.sink.endpoint.disconnect.name: camel.sink.endpoint.disconnect
camel.sink.endpoint.disconnect.description: Disconnect after it finish calling the producer

camel.sink.endpoint.enableSniffer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.enableSniffer
camel.sink.endpoint.enableSniffer.description: Enable automatically discover nodes from a running Elasticsearch cluster

camel.sink.endpoint.hostAddresses.name: camel.sink.endpoint.hostAddresses
camel.sink.endpoint.hostAddresses.description: Comma separated list with ip:port formatted remote transport addresses to use.

camel.sink.endpoint.indexName.name: camel.sink.endpoint.indexName
camel.sink.endpoint.indexName.description: The name of the index to act against

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.maxRetryTimeout.name: camel.sink.endpoint.maxRetryTimeout
camel.sink.endpoint.maxRetryTimeout.description: The time in ms before retry

camel.sink.endpoint.operation.name: camel.sink.endpoint.operation
camel.sink.endpoint.operation.description: What operation to perform One of: [Index] [Update] [Bulk] [BulkIndex] [GetById] [MultiGet] [MultiSearch] [Delete] [DeleteIndex] [Search] [Exists] [Ping]

camel.sink.endpoint.scrollKeepAliveMs.name: camel.sink.endpoint.scrollKeepAliveMs
camel.sink.endpoint.scrollKeepAliveMs.description: Time in ms during which elasticsearch will keep search context alive

camel.sink.endpoint.sniffAfterFailureDel.name: camel.sink.endpoint.sniffAfterFailureDelay
camel.sink.endpoint.sniffAfterFailureDel.description: The delay of a sniff execution scheduled after a failure (in milliseconds)

camel.sink.endpoint.snifferInterval.name: camel.sink.endpoint.snifferInterval
camel.sink.endpoint.snifferInterval.description: The interval between consecutive ordinary sniff executions in milliseconds. Will be honoured when sniffOnFailure is disabled or when there are no failures between consecutive sniff executions

camel.sink.endpoint.socketTimeout.name: camel.sink.endpoint.socketTimeout
camel.sink.endpoint.socketTimeout.description: The timeout in ms to wait before the socket will timeout.

camel.sink.endpoint.waitForActiveShards.name: camel.sink.endpoint.waitForActiveShards
camel.sink.endpoint.waitForActiveShards.description: Index creation waits for the write consistency number of shards to be available

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.lazyS.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.lazyS.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.autow.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.autow.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.clien.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.client
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.clien.description: To use an existing configured Elasticsearch client, instead of creating a client per endpoint. This allow to customize the client with specific settings.

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.conne.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.connectionTimeout
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.conne.description: The time in ms to wait before connection will timeout.

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.enabl.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.enableSniffer
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.enabl.description: Enable automatically discover nodes from a running Elasticsearch cluster

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.hostA.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.hostAddresses
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.hostA.description: Comma separated list with ip:port formatted remote transport addresses to use. The ip and port options must be left blank for hostAddresses to be considered instead.

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.maxRe.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.maxRetryTimeout
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.maxRe.description: The time in ms before retry

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.sniff.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.sniffAfterFailureDelay
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.sniff.description: The delay of a sniff execution scheduled after a failure (in milliseconds)

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.sniff.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.snifferInterval
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.sniff.description: The interval between consecutive ordinary sniff executions in milliseconds. Will be honoured when sniffOnFailure is disabled or when there are no failures between consecutive sniff executions

camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.socke.name: camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.socketTimeout
camel.component.elasticsearch-rest.socke.description: The timeout in ms to wait before the socket will timeout.
